COMMENT_TX: ej,shefg001,P,hallt901,Fighting with Jason Kendall ej,kendj001,P,hallt901,Fighting with Gary Sheffield $Roger Cedeno was trapped in a rundown and Gary Sheffield tried to score; catcher Jason Kendall was waiting at the plate with the ball as Sheffield arrive; the latter tried to avoid the tag rather than run through Kendall; however, Sheffield slapped at Kendall's helmet, knocking it off; Kendall yalled at Sheffield, who yelled back and then tried to tackle Kendall; both benches emptied; Sheffield threw some punches; Raul Mondesi also punched Kendall; Sheffield and Kendall ejected by HP umpire Tom Hallion
ej,bonib001,P,hohnb901,Balls and strikes Bobby Bonilla ejected by HP umpire Bill Hohn during at bat
